cwipp.Plume.get_wf¶

Plume.get_wf()¶

Finds characteristic time (Tau) and velocity (wf) scales.

Returns

  • wf (float) – characteristic fire velocity scale [m s-1]

  • Tau (float) – characteristic timescale [s]
